text: <!channel> Hey guys, I want to host a postcard-writing day during lunch either Thursday or Friday. Can you guys bring in postcards you don't need that are at home & drop them off at my desk? Bonus points for bringing in stamps.

attachments.title: What Effective Protest Could Look Like
attachments.text: Perspective from the right on Trumpâ€™s political challenge for the left
attachments.fallback: The Atlantic: What Effective Protest Could Look Like

text:
TL;DR:
1) Be professional, and on message. Wave the flag and carry the Constitution. Use "their" people to sell your message.
2) Pick a message. We can't slay all the dragons at once.
3) Harness the energy of the protest, but meet to get organized, cultivate hope, and turn that energy to action.

been thinking a lot of #3...i want to show up to my next protest with a list of state districts/political groups/meetings to share with people so they can find out exactly how they can take the energy from the protest to their local elected officials
